name.en: Welcome to the Foreclosure Task Force!
name.jp: Welcome to the Foreclosure Task Force!
name.thai: Welcome to the Foreclosure Task Force!
name.ko: Welcome to the Foreclosure Task Force!

desc.en: 老师读了阿拜多斯高中寄来的信后，得知学生们受到暴力组织欺压的消息，于是便前往阿拜多斯自治区帮助他们，但却一下子就迷路遇难了。
desc.jp: 老师读了阿拜多斯高中寄来的信后，得知学生们受到暴力组织欺压的消息，于是便前往阿拜多斯自治区帮助他们，但却一下子就迷路遇难了。
desc.thai: 老师读了阿拜多斯高中寄来的信后，得知学生们受到暴力组织欺压的消息，于是便前往阿拜多斯自治区帮助他们，但却一下子就迷路遇难了。
desc.ko: 老师读了阿拜多斯高中寄来的信后，得知学生们受到暴力组织欺压的消息，于是便前往阿拜多斯自治区帮助他们，但却一下子就迷路遇难了。
desc.zh_tw: 老師讀了阿拜多斯高中寄來的信後，得知學生們受到暴力組織欺壓的消息，於是便前往阿拜多斯自治區幫助他們，但卻 一下子就迷路遇難了。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师读了阿拜多斯高中寄来的信后，得知学生们受到暴力组织欺压的消息，于是便前往阿拜多斯自治区帮助他们，但却一下子就迷路遇难了。

desc.en: After taking office for several days, Aorona said that many students had sent their help letters, in which one of them came from Abydos High School.
desc.jp: After taking office for several days, Aorona said that many students had sent their help letters, in which one of them came from Abydos High School.
desc.thai: After taking office for several days, Aorona said that many students had sent their help letters, in which one of them came from Abydos High School.
desc.ko: After taking office for several days, Aorona said that many students had sent their help letters, in which one of them came from Abydos High School.
desc.zh_tw: 在上任幾天后，阿羅娜表示許多學生都送來了求助信，而其中一篇則來自阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在上任几天后，阿罗娜表示许多学生都送来了求助信，而其中一篇则来自阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在上任几天后，阿罗娜表示许多学生都送来了求助信，而其中一篇则来自阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在上任几天后，阿罗娜表示许多学生都送来了求助信，而其中一篇则来自阿拜多斯高中。

desc.en: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。

desc.en: Sensei read the letter from Abydos, knowing that they were under attack of criminal organizations and facing problems like the ammunition running out. They thus requested help from Schale.
desc.jp: Sensei read the letter from Abydos, knowing that they were under attack of criminal organizations and facing problems like the ammunition running out. They thus requested help from Schale.
desc.thai: Sensei read the letter from Abydos, knowing that they were under attack of criminal organizations and facing problems like the ammunition running out. They thus requested help from Schale.
desc.ko: Sensei read the letter from Abydos, knowing that they were under attack of criminal organizations and facing problems like the ammunition running out. They thus requested help from Schale.
desc.zh_tw: 老師閱讀了阿拜多斯的信，信中提到了阿拜多斯遭受暴力組織攻擊、彈藥耗盡等問題，並由此請求老師的幫助。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师阅读了阿拜多斯的信，信中提到了阿拜多斯遭受暴力组织攻击、弹药耗尽等问题，并由此请求老师的帮助。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师阅读了阿拜多斯的信，信中提到了阿拜多斯遭受暴力组织攻击、弹药耗尽等问题，并由此请求老师的帮助。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师阅读了阿拜多斯的信，信中提到了阿拜多斯遭受暴力组织攻击、弹药耗尽等问题，并由此请求老师的帮助。

desc.en: Aorona briefly introduced Sensei with the situations in Abydos, and was shocked at the fact that Abydos High School was being attacked. Right away, Sensei went to Abydos on a business trip.
desc.jp: Aorona briefly introduced Sensei with the situations in Abydos, and was shocked at the fact that Abydos High School was being attacked. Right away, Sensei went to Abydos on a business trip.
desc.thai: Aorona briefly introduced Sensei with the situations in Abydos, and was shocked at the fact that Abydos High School was being attacked. Right away, Sensei went to Abydos on a business trip.
desc.ko: Aorona briefly introduced Sensei with the situations in Abydos, and was shocked at the fact that Abydos High School was being attacked. Right away, Sensei went to Abydos on a business trip.
desc.zh_tw: 彩奈向老師簡單介紹了一下阿拜多斯當地的情況，並對“阿拜多斯學院”被攻擊一事感到驚異。之後，老師立刻到阿拜多斯自治區出差。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜向老师简单介绍了一下阿拜多斯当地的情况，并对“阿拜多斯学院”被攻击一事感到惊异。之后，老师立刻到阿拜多斯自治区出差。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阿罗娜向老师简单介绍了一下阿拜多斯当地的情况，并对“阿拜多斯学院”被攻击一事感到惊异。之后，老师立刻到阿拜多斯自治区出差。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 阿罗娜向老师简单介绍了一下阿拜多斯当地的情况，并对“阿拜多斯学院”被攻击一事感到惊异。之后，老师立刻到阿拜多斯自治区出差。

desc.en: 老师被白子救出来之后，抵达阿拜多斯高中的废校对策委员会社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击阿拜多斯高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。
desc.jp: 老师被白子救出来之后，抵达阿拜多斯高中的废校对策委员会社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击阿拜多斯高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。
desc.thai: 老师被白子救出来之后，抵达阿拜多斯高中的废校对策委员会社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击阿拜多斯高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。
desc.ko: 老师被白子救出来之后，抵达阿拜多斯高中的废校对策委员会社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击阿拜多斯高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。
desc.zh_tw: 老師被白子救出來後，抵達阿拜多斯高中的廢校對策委員會社團活動室。然而當時片方頭盔團卻來攻擊阿拜多斯高中， 於是老師就和學生們一起出面擊退他們。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师被白子救出来之后，抵达阿拜多斯高中的废校对策委员会社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击阿拜多斯高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师被白子救出来之后，抵达阿拜多斯高中的废校对策委员会社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击阿拜多斯高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师被白子救出来之后，抵达阿拜多斯高中的废校对策委员会社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击阿拜多斯高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。

desc.en: After meeting Shiroko, Sensei expressed the fact that he was on a business story but lost. Shiroko said that the surrounding areas have long been abandoned, and offered Sensei a can of energy drink. Later, Shiroko carried Sensei to arrive at school.
desc.jp: After meeting Shiroko, Sensei expressed the fact that he was on a business story but lost. Shiroko said that the surrounding areas have long been abandoned, and offered Sensei a can of energy drink. Later, Shiroko carried Sensei to arrive at school.
desc.thai: After meeting Shiroko, Sensei expressed the fact that he was on a business story but lost. Shiroko said that the surrounding areas have long been abandoned, and offered Sensei a can of energy drink. Later, Shiroko carried Sensei to arrive at school.
desc.ko: After meeting Shiroko, Sensei expressed the fact that he was on a business story but lost. Shiroko said that the surrounding areas have long been abandoned, and offered Sensei a can of energy drink. Later, Shiroko carried Sensei to arrive at school.
desc.zh_tw: 老師在遇見了白子之後，向白子表示自己是來出差的，但苦於找不到路。白子表示周邊地區均已廢棄，並向老師遞能量飲料喝。之後，白子背著老師到達了學校。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师在遇见了白子之后，向白子表示自己是来出差的，但苦于找不到路。白子表示周边地区均已废弃，并向老师递能量饮料喝。之后，白子背着老师到达了学校。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师在遇见了白子之后，向白子表示自己是来出差的，但苦于找不到路。白子表示周边地区均已废弃，并向老师递能量饮料喝。之后，白子背着老师到达了学校。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师在遇见了白子之后，向白子表示自己是来出差的，但苦于找不到路。白子表示周边地区均已废弃，并向老师递能量饮料喝。之后，白子背着老师到达了学校。

desc.en: When everyone was about to discuss, gunshots were heard outside; it turned at that the Helmet Gang was attacking Abydos again. Sensei stayed in the office to command them, while others initialized the battle.
desc.jp: When everyone was about to discuss, gunshots were heard outside; it turned at that the Helmet Gang was attacking Abydos again. Sensei stayed in the office to command them, while others initialized the battle.
desc.thai: When everyone was about to discuss, gunshots were heard outside; it turned at that the Helmet Gang was attacking Abydos again. Sensei stayed in the office to command them, while others initialized the battle.
desc.ko: When everyone was about to discuss, gunshots were heard outside; it turned at that the Helmet Gang was attacking Abydos again. Sensei stayed in the office to command them, while others initialized the battle.
desc.zh_tw: 就在眾人準備討論事務時，外面突然響起槍聲，原來是頭盔圈又來進攻阿拜多斯了。眾人立刻開始作戰，老師則留在辦公室進行指揮。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在众人准备讨论事务时，外面突然响起枪声，原来是头盔圈又来进攻阿拜多斯了。众人立刻开始作战，老师则留在办公室进行指挥。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 就在众人准备讨论事务时，外面突然响起枪声，原来是头盔圈又来进攻阿拜多斯了。众人立刻开始作战，老师则留在办公室进行指挥。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 就在众人准备讨论事务时，外面突然响起枪声，原来是头盔圈又来进攻阿拜多斯了。众人立刻开始作战，老师则留在办公室进行指挥。

name.en: A Day in the Life of Serika
name.jp: A Day in the Life of Serika
name.thai: A Day in the Life of Serika
name.ko: A Day in the Life of Serika

desc.en: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.jp: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.thai: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.ko: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.zh_tw: 老師和對策委員會學生們跟蹤茜香，來到她打工的拉麵店。大家吃了拉麵度過愉快的時光，可是茜香依然一副沒好氣的樣子。茜香在打完工回家的路上被頭盔團綁架。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师和对策委员会学生们跟踪茜香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是茜香依然一副没好气的样子。茜香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师和对策委员会学生们跟踪茜香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是茜香依然一副没好气的样子。茜香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师和对策委员会学生们跟踪茜香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是茜香依然一副没好气的样子。茜香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。

desc.en: Sensei brought others at the FTF to the very ramen store that Serika was working for. Though surprised, Serika led the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposed to pay with her cards, but Sensei did that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returned to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.

Though surprised, Serika led the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposed to pay with her cards, but Sensei did that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returned to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.
desc.zh_tw: 老師帶著對策委員會的其它人來到了茜香打工的拉麵店，茜香大為震撼。然後，茜香帶領大家就坐；之後，野乃美主動提出結賬，但老師最終還是用大人的卡片結了賬。吃飽後，大家在茜香的難堪與強烈要求下返回了學校。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师带着对策委员会的其它人来到了茜香打工的拉面店，茜香大为震撼。然后，茜香带领大家就坐；之后，野乃美主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在茜香的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师带着对策委员会的其它人来到了茜香打工的拉面店，茜香大为震撼。然后，茜香带领大家就坐；之后，野乃美主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在茜香的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师带着对策委员会的其它人来到了茜香打工的拉面店，茜香大为震撼。然后，茜香带领大家就坐；之后，野乃美主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在茜香的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。
